text: Feyzi (Persian: فیضی) is a Turkish-language masculine given name and Persian- language surname derived from the Persian noun of Arabic origin فیض (fayz) with the meaning "grace". Notable people with the name include: == Given name == * Feyzi Mengüç (1894–1983), Ottoman military person * Feyzi Pirinççioğlu (1878–1933), Turkish politician * Feyzi Ahsen Böre (1917–1975), Turkish ice hockey player == Surname == * Mohammad Feyzi (born 1981), Iranian academic and reformist politician * Yaser Feyzi (born 1992), Iranian footballer Category:Turkish masculine given names Category:Persian-language surnames
title: Feyzi
